DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , single-center clinical trial 50 eye subject schedule undergo LASIK surgery require initial corneal flap . Subjects screen eligibility . Subjects undergo LASIK surgery use LenSx Laser create corneal flap prior excimer laser treatment . Subjects evaluate intraoperatively assess ease lifting flap , stromal bed quality , amount opaque bubble layer . All patient follow routine vision exams 3 month postoperatively evaluate change visual acuity , manifest refraction , slit lamp examination , endothelial cell count .
DOC.brief_title: Creating LASIK Flaps With LenSx Femtosecond Laser
DOC.criteria: 1 . Must myopia hyperopia eligible femtosecond initiate LASIK surgery 2 . Must 18 year age 3 . Must visual acuity correctable least 20/25 eye 4 . If subject contact lens wearer , discontinuation contact lens wear prior preoperative exam ( 2 week prior soft contact lens , 4 week prior rigid gas permeable contact lens , 8 week prior hard contact lens ) 5 . Must willing able return schedule follow examination 3 month surgery 6 . Must sign give copy write Informed Consent form 7 . Postoperative refractive target emmetropia 1 . Known sensitivity plan study concomitant medication 2 . Participation ophthalmic drug device clinical trial time clinical investigation 3 . Presenting contraindication femtosecond initiate LASIK 4 . Corneal thickness value result residual bed le 280 micron flap resection excimer ablation calculate 5 . Irregular astigmatism , base Investigator 's judgment 6 . Undergoing monovision LASIK 7 . Pregnant , lactate plan become pregnant course study 8 . For bilateral second study eye : The surgeon shall proceed second eye 1 week exam first eye show vision threaten complication .
